FAQ

Create FAQ

Request POST

/api/faq/admin/create/
Parameter Type Position # Description
question string body Required question
answer string body Required answer

Response 

    {
        "is_success": true,
        "item": {
            "id": 1,
            "question": "...",
            "answer": "...",
            "sort_order": "...",
            "is_active": False,
            "created_at": "2021-02-07",
            "updated_at": "2021-02-07"
        }
        "form_errors": {}
    }

All FAQ For Admin

Request POST

/api/faq/admin/all/
Parameter Type Position # Description

Response 

    {
        "is_success": true,
        "items": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "question": "...",
                "answer": "...",
                "sort_order": "...",
                "is_active": False,
                "created_at": "2021-02-07",
                "updated_at": "2021-02-07"
            },
            {
                "id": 2,
                "question": "...",
                "answer": "...",
                "sort_order": "...",
                "is_active": False,
                "created_at": "2021-02-07",
                "updated_at": "2021-02-07"
            },
        ]
    }

Save Sort FAQ

Request POST

/api/faq/admin/int:pk/save-sort/
Parameter Type Position # Description
sort_order list body Required sort order list

Response 

    {
        "is_success": true,
    }

Toggle Update FAQ

Request POST

/api/faq/admin/int:pk/toggle-active/
Parameter Type Position # Description
is_active boolean body Required is it activated ?

Response 

    {
        "is_success": true
    }

Update FAQ

Request POST

/api/faq/admin/int:pk/update/
Parameter Type Position # Description
question string body Required question
answer string body Required answer

Response 

    {
        "is_success": true,
        "item": {
            "id": 1,
            "question": "...",
            "answer": "...",
            "sort_order": "...",
            "is_active": False,
            "created_at": "2021-02-07",
            "updated_at": "2021-02-07"
        }
        "form_errors": {}
    }

Request POST

All FAQ For Public

Request POST

/api/faq/all/
Parameter Type Position # Description

Response 

    {
        "is_success": true,
        "items": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "question": "...",
                "answer": "..",
            },
            {
                "id": 2,
                "question": "...",
                "answer": "..",
            },
            {
                "id": 3,
                "question": "...",
                "answer": "..",
            },
        ]
    }
